languages.text: {n}Висирь отворачивается на мгновение, кивая пустоте.{/n} "Паства Его жертвует кровь от крови своей — так приходят ткачи в этот храм. Но остаются Кровавую паутину плести лишь те, кто по своей воле готов Ему служить. Как Кибелла".

traits.locale_text: {n}Висирь отворачивается на мгновение, кивая пустоте.{/n} "Паства Его жертвует кровь от крови своей — так приходят ткачи в этот храм. Но лишь тот, кто по собственной воле готов Неумирающему служить, плетет Кровавую паутину. Вольна была покинуть чертоги смерти Кибелла... но осталась".

languages.text: {n}The Vizsier looks away for a brief moment and nods to empty space.{/n} "The Undying One's congregation sacrifices the blood of its blood. That is how spinners are brought into this temple. But only those who would serve Him of their own volition stay and spin the Bloodspun Web. As Kibellah did."
languages.original_text: {n}Висирь отворачивается на мгновение, кивая пустоте.{/n} "Паства Его жертвует кровь от крови своей — так приходят ткачи в этот храм. Но остаются Кровавую паутину плести лишь те, кто по своей воле готов Ему служить. Как Кибелла".

That is how weavers are brought into this temple. But only those who would serve Him of their own volition stay and weave the Bloodspun Web. As Kibellah did."

But only those who would serve Him of their own volition stay and spin the Bloodspun Web. As Kibellah did."

But only those who would serve Him of their own volition stay and spin the Bloodspun Web. As Kibellah did."

But only those who would serve Him of their own volition stay and spin the Bloodspun Web. As Kibellah did."

languages.text: {n}Le vizir se détourne un bref instant et acquiesce en direction du vide.{/n} « La congrégation de l'Immortel sacrifie le sang de son sang. C'est ainsi que les tisseurs intègrent son temple. Mais seuls ceux qui font le choix de Le servir de leur plein gré restent pour tisser la Toile, comme l'a fait Kibellah. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier looks away for a brief moment and nods to empty space.{/n} "The Undying One's congregation sacrifices the blood of its blood. That is how spinners are brought into this temple. But only those who would serve Him of their own volition stay and spin the Bloodspun Web. As Kibellah did."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vizir se détourne un bref instant et acquiesce en direction du vide.{/n} « La congrégation de l'Immortel sacrifie le sang de son sang. C'est ainsi que les tisseurs intègrent son temple. Mais seuls ceux qui font le choix de Le servir de leur plein gré restent pour tisser la Toile, comme l'a fait Kibellah. »

languages.text: {n}El Visir echa la vista a otra parte un momento y asiente en dirección al espacio.{/n} «La congregación del Inmortal sacrifica la sangre de su sangre. Así es como llegan los tejedores a este templo, pero solo aquellos que quieran servirle por voluntad propia se quedan y ayudan a tejer la Red Sanguinolenta. Así lo hizo Kibellah».
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier looks away for a brief moment and nods to empty space.{/n} "The Undying One's congregation sacrifices the blood of its blood. That is how spinners are brought into this temple. But only those who would serve Him of their own volition stay and spin the Bloodspun Web. As Kibellah did."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Visir echa la vista a otra parte un momento y asiente en dirección al espacio.{/n} «La congregación del Inmortal sacrifica la sangre de su sangre. Así es como llegan los tejedores a este templo, pero solo aquellos que quieran servirle por voluntad propia se quedan y ayudan a tejer la Red Sanguinolenta. Así lo hizo Kibellah».

languages.text: {n}ヴィジールは一瞬視線を動かして、何もない空間に向かってうなずく。{/n}「不死の者の信徒はその血を生贄に捧げます。そうやって織り手がこの神殿に集まるのです。ですが、ブラッドスパン・ウェブに残って紡いでいくのは、己の意志であの方に仕える者だけです。キベラがそうであったように」
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier looks away for a brief moment and nods to empty space.{/n} "The Undying One's congregation sacrifices the blood of its blood. That is how spinners are brought into this temple. But only those who would serve Him of their own volition stay and spin the Bloodspun Web. As Kibellah did."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴィジールは一瞬視線を動かして、何もない空間に向かってうなずく。{/n}「不死の者の信徒はその血を生贄に捧げます。そうやって織り手がこの神殿に集まるのです。ですが、ブラッドスパン・ウェブに残って紡いでいくのは、己の意志であの方に仕える者だけです。キベラがそうであったように」

languages.text: {n}宿老短暂地移开了视线，向空无一物之处点了点头。{/n}“不死之神的信徒会自愿献祭他们的鲜血之血，圣殿里的织网者都是这么来的。不过，只有那些自愿侍奉祂的人才会留下来纺织这张血色的罗网，如同绮贝菈一样。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier looks away for a brief moment and nods to empty space.{/n} "The Undying One's congregation sacrifices the blood of its blood. That is how spinners are brought into this temple. But only those who would serve Him of their own volition stay and spin the Bloodspun Web. As Kibellah did."

traits.locale_text: {n}宿老短暂地移开了视线，向空无一物之处点了点头。{/n}“不死之神的信徒会自愿献祭他们的鲜血之血，圣殿里的织网者都是这么来的。不过，只有那些自愿侍奉祂的人才会留下来纺织这张血色的罗网，如同绮贝菈一样。”

languages.text: {n}Der Wesir blickt einen Augenblick lang weg und nickt in den leeren Raum.{/n} "Die Gemeinde des Todlosen opfert das Blut ihres Blutes. So werden Weber in diesen Tempel gebracht. Doch wer ihm freiwillig dienen möchte, der bleibt und spinnt das Blutgesponnene Netz. Wie Kibellah es getan hat."
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier looks away for a brief moment and nods to empty space.{/n} "The Undying One's congregation sacrifices the blood of its blood. That is how spinners are brought into this temple. But only those who would serve Him of their own volition stay and spin the Bloodspun Web. As Kibellah did."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Wesir blickt einen Augenblick lang weg und nickt in den leeren Raum.{/n} "Die Gemeinde des Todlosen opfert das Blut ihres Blutes. So werden Weber in diesen Tempel gebracht. Doch wer ihm freiwillig dienen möchte, der bleibt und spinnt das Blutgesponnene Netz. Wie Kibellah es getan hat."

languages.text: {n}Vezir, bir anlığına bakışlarını kaçırıp boşluğa doğru başını eğiyor.{/n} "Ölmeyen'in cemaati, kendi kanından olanları kurban eder. Dokurlar, bu tapınağa böyle getirilir. Yalnızca O'na kendi isteğiyle hizmet edenler geriye kalarak Kanipi Ağı'nı örer. Tıpkı Kibellah gibi."
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier looks away for a brief moment and nods to empty space.{/n} "The Undying One's congregation sacrifices the blood of its blood. That is how spinners are brought into this temple. But only those who would serve Him of their own volition stay and spin the Bloodspun Web. As Kibellah did."
